option.value: <vector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:width="24dp" android:height="24dp" android:viewportWidth="24" android:viewportHeight="24" android:tint="?attr/colorOnSurface"> <path android:fillColor="@android:color/white" android:pathData="M12,12c2.21,0 4,-1.79 4,-4s-1.79,-4 -4,-4 -4,1.79 -4,4 1.79,4 4,4zM12,14c-2.67,0 -8,1.34 -8,4v2h16v-2c0,-2.66 -5.33,-4 -8,-4z"/> </vector>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="180dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/primaryColor" android:padding="24dp" android:gravity="bottom">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/image_avatar" android:layout_width="64dp" android:layout_height="64dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_person_playstore" android:background="@drawable/circle_bg" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="@string/avatar" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/text_name" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="User Name" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="18sp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/text_email" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="user@gmail.com" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="14sp" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" />
</LinearLayout>
